name: E-Prime 2.0 Startup Info File
summary: Learn about .STARTUPINFO files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Startup Info files can only be created with the Professional version of E-Prime, which includes a program called the StartupInfo Editor.
NOTE: STARTUPINFO files must be located in the same directory as the .ES2 or .EBS2 experiment file for the parameters to load properly.

description: Parameters file used by psychology experiments created with E-Prime software; saved in an XML format and specifies parameters to be loaded into the experiment while it runs; enables text or other data to be contextualized while conducting the experiment.
